metadata.title: USN-4742-1 -- Django vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that Django incorrectly accepted semicolons as query parameters. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to perform a Web Cache Poisoning attack.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4742-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  python3-django - 2:2.2.12-1ubuntu0.4 python-django-doc - 2:2.2.12-1ubuntu0.4 No subscription required
